Name: FRAME_RATE
Comment: Frame rate per second of screen update in Hz. 20Hz=50msec 50Hz=20msec

Name: Relay_Module_UART_port_name
Comment: UART port name of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_baud_rate
Comment: UART baud rate of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_data_bits
Comment: UART baud rate of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_stop_bits
Comment: UART stop bits of Relay module.

Name: C_RELAY_MODULE_INDICATOR_OFF_FILL
Comment: Color of fill of relay indicator box. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_RELAY_MODULE_INDICATOR_OFF_STROKE
Comment: Color of stroke of relay indicator box and text. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BG
Comment: Background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_VERSION_DATE_TEXT
Comment: Color of version and date text. Color data format is AARRGGBB
